locations.name: Kanbara
locations.description: The bustling port town of Kanbara is one of the most densely packed cities in all of Lenovia

locations.name: City
locations.description: The bustling port town of Kanbara is one of the most densely packed cities in all of Lenovia

locations.name: An Open Field
locations.description: The waist high grasses stretch into the distance. They don't obscure your view, but as they drift in the wind they give you the sensation of floating on a calm sea.

locations.name: Apple Tree
locations.description: The tree's leaves rustle in the wind, dusting it with the smell of apples.
